title: NFL Draft: Top 10 Wide Receiver Prospects with Ryan Wilson (Football 4/9)
description:
Will Brinson is joined by Ryan Wilson as 'offensive prospect rankings week' continues on the Pick Six podcast, with a focus on this year's wide receiving class. Could 2020's crop of wideouts go down as the best group ever? You can certainly make the case during the pre-draft process. It's such a stacked position, Ryan had to leave some well-known names off his Top 10 list. How many will go in the 1st 2 rounds---double digits? Who's WR1: CeeDee Lamb, Jerry Jeudy or Henry Ruggs III? Get prepped on 2020 WRs, as the guys dissect their playing style, draft range and potential team fits.
'Pick Six' is available on Apple Podcasts, Spotify, Stitcher, Google Podcasts, Castbox and wherever else you listen to podcasts. 
Follow the Pick Six team on Twitter: @picksixpod @WillBrinson, @ryanwilsoncbs
Check out the Pick Six Instagram page https://www.instagram.com/picksixpod/?hl=en
Join our Facebook group https://www.facebook.com/groups/758548147935545/
For more NFL coverage from CBS Sports, visit https://www.cbssports.com/nfl/
To hear more from the CBS Sports Podcast Network, visit https://www.cbssports.com/podcasts/
